segments.text: Hi , I need to copy something right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our computer lab on the first floor has a copy machine , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , one copy is ten cents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , I'll be down there shortly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You probably won't have to wait for anyone , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
